result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shane A. Harrison

defendant.name: Harrison, Shane A.
defendant.address: 225 E Adams Ave, Fall Creek, WI 54742

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on March 28, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on March 28, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Final status/scheduling conference on March 2, 2023 at 09:30 am.

(Case called at 9:28 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Shane A. Harrison appeared by video without counsel.  Attorney Trenton John Piltz appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
State in compliance with victim notification requirements. Defendant waives right to an attorney. State requests this case be scheduled for Jury Trial. 
Final Status Conference: 03/02/2023 at 9:30 AM (IN PERSON for 1/2 hour). 
2 Day Jury Trial: 03/28/2023 and 03/29/2023- Pre-Trial Conference at 8:30 AM and Jury Selection to start at 9:00 AM.
Status conference on September 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on September 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:03 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane A. Harrison in court without counsel. 
There is no agreement at this time. Defendant enters a not guilty plea which is received by the Court. 
A status conference is to be scheduled with Branch 3.
Letter to defendant with amended signature bond ordered by court 06/13/2022. Request to return signed bond and Affidavit of Witness form to Clerk of Court no later than 06/23/2022.

Conditions:
Contact allowed with Y.H., conditioned upon no acts or threats of violence; not allowed to discuss the case.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone to include D.M.

Court order to amend bond and conditions of bond to remove the condition of no in-person contact with Y.H. and add the condition of no acts of threats and/or violence. All other conditions of bond shall remain in effect until further order of the Court.
CK 43960 mailed to defendant. Signature bond ordered, bail posted refunded.

Conditions:
No contact with Y.H., except allowed telephone contact, no in person contact. Not allowed to discuss the case. 
No acts or threats of violence against anyone to include D.M.

(11:43 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Shane A. Harrison in court without counsel.
Defendant advises doesn't have a copy of the complaint.
Court provides the defendant with a copy and advises the defendant to have a seat and review the complaint.
(11:46 AM case recalled.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Shane A. Harrison in court without counsel.
Defendant has reviewed the complaint and waives formal reading of the complaint.
Defendant advised of right to an attorney. 
Defendant updates phone number with the Court.
Court orders the defendant to have finger prints taken today before leaving the court house.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on June 22, 2022 at 2 pm.
Hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
No contact with Y.H., except allowed telephone contact, no in person contact. Not allowed to discuss the case. 
No acts or threats of violence against anyone to include D.M.
